data.title: Transgender Star Pooja Sharma Approached For Bigg Boss 15, May Enter As A 'Commoner'
data.meta_description: If reports are to be believed then transgender Pooja Sharma has been approached for the popular reality show Bigg Boss 15 as a contestant.
data.text:
Reality TV show Bigg Boss has been quite popular among the masses. As of now, running for 14 seasons, the show has been a platform for many artists, helping them reshape their careers. During Bigg Boss 14, host Salman Khan had hinted that the upcoming season might revive the show’s successful ‘celebs vs commoners’ theme. And as we are heading near to the 15th season, there has been news of various celebrities being approached for the show. Now, a recent report states that transgender community star Pooja Sharma might enter as a commoner in the Bigg Boss house.

While nothing has been confirmed yet, the makers of the show are in talks with Pooja Sharma. As per the reports, discussions are on for Pooja to enter as a commoner in Bigg Boss 15. For those unaware, Pooja is a social media influencer with an eager following of 200k people on Instagram. She is known for spreading awareness about her community and for breaking gender stereotypes.

Also, Pooja is lovingly called Rekha for her resemblance to the legendary Hindi film actress in terms of her elegant saree looks. Pooja’s life story boasts of an interesting journey. From begging in trains to rising as a social media influencer, her story is quite inspiring. Pooja’s charming personality and elegant dance moves won thousands of hearts on the internet. After which, she emerged as a social media star. She currently works for the empowerment of the transgender community.

Well coming back to Bigg Boss 15, many TV and big screen celebrities have been signed-in for the show. Reportedly, actor Rhea Chakraborty will also be a part of the Bigg Boss house. Also, actors Mohsin Khan, Disha Vakani, Surbhi Chandna, and Neha Marda have been approached by the makers. Though nothing has been confirmed yet, fans are super excited for the new season.

Bigg Boss 15 is all set to go on airs from October this year.
